statements.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW active_employees AS
 SELECT
    id,
    name,
    salary,
    status
   FROM employees
  WHERE status = 'active'

Old.name: active_employees
Old.definition:
SELECT id,
    name,
    salary
   FROM employees
  WHERE status::text = 'active'::text

New.name: active_employees
New.definition:

    id,
    name,
    salary,
    status
   FROM employees
  WHERE status = 'active'
